dict.acceptation: 包括( include的现在分词)；包含；列入；包住；

sent.orig: Simplified hough transformation(HT) and adaptive including box method(AIB) approach are proposed.
sent.trans: 提出了简化的霍夫变换HT(Hough Transform)方法和适应性包容盒AIB(Adaptive Including Box)原理。

sent.orig: Most cases are due to Bacteria (including salmonella and staphylococcus) and their toxins (including Botulism).
sent.trans: 大多数急性食物中毒病例是由于细菌（包括沙门氏菌属和葡萄球菌属）及其毒性产物（如肉毒中毒）引起。

sent.orig: Including accommodation, meals available, including the city's transportation costs.
sent.trans: 包括住宿、伙食费用，包括市内交通费用。

sent.orig: Delixi including the Great Wall of electrical appliances, including more than a business told reporters.
sent.trans: 包括德力西、长城电器在内的多家电气企业的人士向记者表示。

sent.orig: Torture, including in medical experiments, and arbitrary imprisonment, including for circuses or films, would be forbidden.
sent.trans: 虐待，包括用于医学实验和一些蛮横的囚禁行为，以及电影中的马戏团表演都将是被禁止的。
